ComicInfo.Series: Night of the Living Dead: Aftermath
ComicInfo.Summary: The undead have overrun Sin City! As the first powerful arc of the new Night of the Living Dead Aftermath series screams toward a violent and horrific end, the few living people left in the city are infected one by one. With the military enforcing quarantine and the ghouls stripping flesh from bone, there is no place left for civilians caught in the line of fire. Zombies are back and these monsters don't just watch the drama unfold. They devour it. Available with Regular cover by Matt Martin, and Wraparound, Gore, and Terror Retailer Incentive covers by Raulo Caceres.
